121.content:
July 18, 2016
50,000 Feet Above Tokyo, Japan
3:00 PM Local Time

The meteor scythed through the afternoon sky, glowing white-hot and leaving a trail of fire hundreds of feet long in its wake as it screamed toward terra firma. Only that morning had the object been detected entering Earth's gravity well, seemingly from nowhere--it was almost as if the big rock had sneaked past any detection. Despite the strange behavior, an impact site and time was soon determined: Tokyo Bay, sometime that afternoon. The Japanese response was immediate and decisive: evacuations were issued of much of the capital, the Diet (Japanese legislature; think Parliament or a Senate) was relocated to Nagasaki, and all flights and incoming ships were warned and redirected towards safer destinations.

It all would have been a fantastic reaction, if not for one detail: the "meteor" was, in fact, an orbital drop pod--a troop transport with a single, gigantic inhabitant: Soyaka. And the people of Earth would soon wish, oh so very, VERY much, that they had suffered a mere meteor strike.

Soyaka had already made a name for herself as a one-girl army. Whenever someone wanted a race of smaller scale dealt with, but didn't want to send in an entire army, they sent her instead. She was young for a mercenary, just on the tail end of thirteen, but that hadn't stopped her from smashing entire cities to rubble--or getting filthy rich from doing it. And it looked like she was in for another paycheck.

Inside her disguised pod, Soyaka grinned ear to ear as she neared her destination. No matter how many times she had done this, she always got giddy before a job; always relished a chance to "Smash, Thrash, and Get My Cash", as she put it. And from what she'd learned about this "Earth" place, she was in for one hell of a fun time. The planet was nothing short of beautiful, covered in giant blue oceans, and the land held everything from deserts to jungles to mountains and everything in-between. It was a really nice place to live; these humans sure had lucked out evolving on a place like this.

"And now I have to make a mess of it," Soyaka said out loud, giving her blue bikini a once-over. These humans weren't exactly the most advanced race on the galactic neighborhood, so wearing her usual combat armor would be a waste of time. "Better to go in something comfy for an easy job like this," Soyaka said with a giggle, adjusting the straps on the bottom (hired gun though she was, Soyaka had a sense of modesty). "Besides, this isn't an extermination--thank the gods for that!--I just have to smash the place until the local tinies surrender, then call in Saris and tell him he can drop by and build his vacation home...heh, if that smooth-talker hadn't offered so much money I'd have turned him down; this place is nice."

As the pod slammed into the bay, Soyaka had another thought.
"I REALLY have to stop talking to myself....."
=======================

10 Minutes Later, After Impact

The meteor's impact was...underwhelming. It made the ground shake and caused a titanic fountain of water to erupt into the air, but beyond that, nothing. No damage was done beyond a few abandoned boats being smashed and a slew of windows broken on buildings close by the bay. The people of Tokyo breathed a sigh of relief...

Until the meteor opened.

From the supposed meteor emerged what could only be called a gigantic young woman, easily 300 feet tall. Clad in a bright blue bikini (small enough to earn many a male's gaze but large enough to still be in good taste), sporting a head of black hair tied into a rough ponytail with a green band, and possessing a slim, toned figure that was still pleasantly big in the "right places", she would have looked like any ordinary girl her age, had she not been so impossibly huge. And then there was that grin she was wearing. It was somewhere between "Kid pulling a prank" and "A cat in front of a mouse." From news helicopters, cell phones and cameras, Tokyo and the world got a very good look at this unexpected visitor.

Soyaka held her smirk as she looked out on the sprawling city. Oh yes, this was going to be fun. All that remained was how to announce herself. She enjoyed making a speech before her rampages whenever she could, and this was just too good a chance to pass up! Even better, these humans seemed to have a liking for giant creatures destroying cities, especially this Tokyo place.

Maybe she could act like some cartoon villain, right down to the evil laugh?
Or, maybe keep it professional; just say why she's here and apologize before she got to work? This was nothing personal after all, just business.
Or perhaps just skip the speech and get to the squashing?

"Decisions, decisions...." Soyaka muttered, tapping her chin.
121.title: Of Course It's Tokyo!

Just who is the monster calling out Soyaka
1221.title: Another Monster Shows Up

123.content:
Soyaka crunched through the streets, each step killing dozens. A giant hand lashed out and dragged across the side of a skyscraper. Glass and bodies rained from the shattered structure, bouncing off the giantess's thigh and hitting the ground far below. Soyaka bent over and grabbed a bus that lay in her path. It was brought before her black hole of a mouth and dropped in. Her gleaming white molars made short work of the metal vehicle and its occupants, and she sighed contentedly as the salty-sweet lump travelled to her stomach. This was a fairly standard Soyaka introduction as she entered a new city. She had landed months ago and ravaged everything in her path. The Midwest was a dead wasteland. Nothing human lived, and very few things as large as a cow had survived Soyaka's visit. Cities were flattened and small towns simply ceased to exist. Now, the alien moved East. She followed several rail lines in a predictable, orderly, brutal, and scarily fast manner. Anything man-made along the side of the tracks was obliterated. Even the largest towns, boasting almost a million people, were consumed and eradicated in hours. Before any type of evacuation could be mounted, the monster was already at Grand Central Station.

Soyaka admired the structure. The humans had interesting architectural styles. Months doing nothing but crushing it had made her somewhat of an expert. The huge building before her was beautiful in its own, simple way. The technology on her home world had been so much more advanced though. Buildings commonly existed in several realities at once, allowing billions to be housed in a square mile. At least, before she grew to her current size and ate them all. Soyaka had needed years roaming space to work all her fellow species off. But she found glass a charming sensation. The way it cracked at the slightest pressure. The charming tinkle as it cascaded downward. The soft tickling against her thick skin. And the shrieks and screams as her arm descended on the wounded and terrified below. Her massive fingers crushed people, benches, and newsstands before cracking the marble floors. They began to close, causing warm popping sensations as they ran over people not being dragged together. Finally, the nightmarish claw machine pulled its victims up to a charmingly cute face Hell-bent on the extinction of their kind. Her warm breath washed over the people and debris clustered in her hand. The force of it sent everyone backwards, blowing much of the inanimate objects and a few of the people off the edge of her palm. The fall ended mercifully quickly, a much kinder end than what Soyaka would give her victims. They were raised over two full, red lips as they spread apart. Wreckage of bodies and vehicles were visible between monolithic white teeth. A glistening red tongue slithered from the moist cave, ready to accept them. All the refugees held on as long as they could, but inevitably they took the tumble onto the soft and damp muscle. It quickly withdrew inside, and the people trapped on it were washed down into a nightmarish hell scape of a slowly digesting city.

Soyaka burped loudly as the newest voyagers reached her stomach. Covering her mouth self-consciously and blushing slightly, she looked at the rest of the city. Below her people scattered in every direction. The trainstation had erupted like a kicked anthive, and now people flooded the street so thickly that they were being crushed against her feet just by the two massive things being there. The police tried futilely to stop her. Soyaka felt their tiny guns' useless shots hit her thighs and stomach like gnats gently tickling her. She wondered at the courage and stupidity of this planet's occupants. They would never be able to stop her, and yet they still kept trying. A staccato burst of gunfire and an increase in the rate of hits alerted her to the arrival of the SWAT. The giantess found their van, it's occupants still in the process of deploying. With particular savagery, she slammed a foot down on it. The reinforced armor gave way with barely a protest, armored troopers barely even registering. Only the sheer number of people crushed under her step alerted Soyaka to the presence of her attackers.
123.title: New York

1231.content:
Soyaka smiled at the carnage and chaos beneath her feet. She strutted down the street humming happily as more lives were snuffed out by her steps. Finally, she reached a suitably large intersection from which to watch the tiny people panic. Gently, she leaned backwards against a skyscraper behind her. As her butt gently pushed against it the windows broke and her massive ass invaded the cramped office building. She felt workers being sandwiched between their cubicle walls as her body crushed them together. She giggled at the feeling and the madness beneath her feet. No matter how they tried, the humans couldn't seem to get away from her. They scurried endlessly over cars and busses, abandoned in the hope that running would be faster. They tripped and fell into the craters her feet left behind. She laughed out loud at the sight of one man trying to get out of a really deep puddle of gore, only to slip and fall back in. The police and paramilitary forces trying to reach her had to fight the flow of traffic, making things even worse. And from the streets leading to this intersection more people kept coming. Soyaka wondered how this species had survived even before she'd arrived.

But now they seemed to gain a sense of direction and order under the instructions of the police. Time to get to work. She pushed off her building, making it creak under the pressure. With a "HIYA", she swung in a circle and kicked the structure in half. It crumbled, slowly falling onto one of the avenues leading in. She caught a chunk of falling concrete feeling its weight. Taking careful aim, she hurled it at the nearest officer holding a loudspeaker. It landed short, rolling over several cars and people before crushing his car. The officer leapt out of the way just in time though, meaning Soyaka had to finish him personally. With a smile she took two steps closer, standing above him. Her body blocked the sun, and her feet right in front of him created an instant slaughterhouse. He dropped the bullhorn, gazing up at the goddess defiantly.

"What are you gonna do, eat me?" He yelled. Soyaka could barely hear him, but she got the gist. She beamed down her cutest smile.

"Of course not, that wouldn't be much fun! I'm going to do this!" the giantess said. She fell backwards, landing on her rear amid a large crowd of refugees. They tickled slightly as they popped, forcing a sigh from her. Then she leaned over, crushing the area in front of her with her breasts. The policeman tried to get away, but two mountainous mounds of flesh weren't dodged as easily as a boulder. Soyaka dragged them back and forth over the ground. Cars, people, and everything vanished beneath them. Soyaka groaned at the stimulation to her mammaries. Her bikini was stained red with the remains of hundreds. In fact, most of her was a beautiful shade of crimson. An evil thought came to her devious mind.

"I'm just filthy! I should probably go take a bath. Who wants to come with?" she asked excitedly, getting back up. She walked around, grabbing people off the ground while saying "You do," and stomping them into mush in equal measure. Soon the square was empty, either dead or clutched in the alien's hands. "Now wait here while I go to the ocean. It'll only be for a minute!" She said. Then she pulled open her bikini bottom and poured all her victims down the back. She felt them forced against her cool skin by the tight garment. There were so many that it was inevitable that...

*Squelch*

Her first step stretched the overloaded underwear tightly against her backside. The tightly packed people were crushed flat against her cheeks or the fabric. Even more unlucky ones were forced down her crack, never to be seen again. Soyaka gave an evil laugh, loving the feeling of the squishy mass fighting for survival against her rear. Then she set off towards the harbor. She knew a rather large evacuation was taking place there, and they'd welcome her rescue of those trapped in her swimsuit.
1231.title: Goddess of Chaos

12312.content:
Soyaka decided to do the right thing and save those trapped next to her butt. She charged forward through the crowds beneath her and buildings in her way, leaving a trail of destruction behind her. She shrugged off skyscrapers, a few scattered bullets, and low-flying helicopters like they were nothing. And there before her was the dockside. Ships of all shapes and sizes filled the water waiting to save people from the alien invader. Soyaka realized that her passengers had not survived the journey sadly enough. Her heart heavy with misery, she stomped over and on the parked emergency buses filled with refugees and into the water. She jumped in with a tremendous splash and doused everything nearby in seawater.

"Brrr!" Soyaka said, rubbing her arms as the freezing water lapped against her thighs. She stepped forward sending miniature tsunamis in all directions. A few small motorboats were smashed against her legs like twigs as she walked between the bigger boats. A small coastguard dinghy started spraying her with a .50 caliber machine gun. She giggled as the bullets were harmlessly absorbed by her skin. She stepped forward and the vessel was smashed against her flesh. Soyaka examined the floating lunchboxes and tried to decide which one to eradicate first. But then a sound like a freight train raced past her ear. She looked up to see another Coastguard ship, this one the size of a small destroyer advancing towards her. Another shot by one of the main guns hit her like a punch to the stomach. She clutched her midsection and toppled over. She felt metal twisting and crumpling against her side. Tiny screams sounded much closer to her ear now. She opened her eyes and saw she'd fallen on one of the cruise ships, destroying its upper decks. Soyaka lifted herself up just in time to see the ship fire again. She quickly jerked sideways, cutting the damaged cruise liner in half. It began to sink to the bottom as she walked over the rear half. The destroyer desperately tried to back away as the angry giantess advanced on it. But she reached out towards her prey and lifted the boat that neared her size out of the water. She held up her knee and smashed in over her leg. She hurled the aft end at another ship and was rewarded with a satisfying explosion. The front half she looked over. A few sailors clung to the railing or weapons. She plucked them off and ate them whole. They joined hundreds of others in kicking futilely at her stomach walls. The hulk of the ship fell into her cleavage. She savagely pressed at the sides of her breasts, rolling and smashing at the sides of the hull. After much denting and bending, the damaged hulk gave in and compressed into a thin sheet of metal. She let the wreckage slide from between her breasts and splash into the ocean.

"You ocean people are way too mean for me. I don't want to spend so much time having to deal with those," Soyaka panted as the destroyer sunk below the surface. Raising her hand, she fired a bolt of green electricity at several small yachts. They burst into floating funeral pyres for their occupants. Soyaka's churning legs dealt with the few who'd managed to jump overboard. She noticed one of the bigger ocean liners trying to slip away unnoticed.

"Stop running!" she said with annoyance. She raised her left palm and fired a stream of greenish liquid at it. The liquid splashed over the entire boat, which began to steam. The screams took on a desperate tone as the acid ate through the ship and doused the people within. Soyaka giggled evilly as the ship rapidly dissolved into a steaming greenish slick on top of the water. The giantess turned back to the inner harbor to see a sight of surprising bravery. One of the ships was moving as fast as it could towards her legs! She quickly lifted a foot and stomped on the front of it, forcing its momentum to drive it deeper. She bathed the portion above water in flames which continued to burn angrily until the entire vessel sunk to the bottom. The harbor effectively blocked, she returned to the few boats left. She sliced a few into neat sections with lasers, leaving two. She dragged one next to the other. The one nearest to land she lay down on, crushing everything above water and forcing its keel to scrape the sandy bottom. Using some of her telekinetic abilities to help her, she lifted the other up over her body. She cut the ship open like slices of cake and held it over her mouth, feeling thousands of tiny people slide from the boat and into her gaping maw. Incapable of scaling her pearly whites, they were slowly forced down her throat by their own weight. When her mouth was full to brimming Soyaka cast the ship aside and closed her mouth. She chewed the mob a little, creating a group small enough to swallow. They were slowly dragged into her belly and landed like a boulder amid other survivors. Soyaka drifted off as her body started the monumental task of digesting thousands.

1312.content:
Soyaka strolled down the mountain, humming a tune as she crunched her lolipop and spat out the stick (though she made sure that it landed in a secluded spot. The clean-up crews would get rid of it, but there was no reason to just leave garbage lying around where everybody could see it). Her dragon-form's tail swished from side to side with every step, stirring up a strong breeze that made the trees shake and wave like a green ocean. She chuckled at the sight. Her creators probably meant for her to topple buildings with her tail-swipes, not make trees shake in the wind.

"Well, to heck with what they want," Soyaka quipped.

A sudden loud crackle echoed through the air, cutting through the serene afternoon. Soyaka started at the intrusion, but quickly turned to a "cliff face" near the mountain she was descending that looked oddly smooth and flat for a natural feature. Mostly because it wasn't. It was really a speaker of ridiculous size, crafted to blend in with the island. It was how the humans who helped keep her island home running communicated with her when she was out and about.

After the crackle of static subsided, a crisp male voice cam through. "Look alive, kid! We've got a new boatload of tourists pulling into port. Should be a normal crowd, so work your magic, alright?" One could almost hear him smiling, even through a speaker.

Soyaka giggled and sketched a salute. (Not that the speakers could see her--she'd made it abundantly clear that she didn't want the humans keeping excessive tabs on her). "Right away, Jim!" she replied. Her smile was even wider than before--Soyaka loved when the tourists came, especially when they brought children. She was a complete sucker for kids; heck, that was mostly why she'd just settled in on Earth rather than wreck the place.1 With a laugh, she flapped her wings and took to the air, heading for the dock on he eastern part of the island.

She touched down in the reception area--an open field uphill from the beachfront--just as the crowd was getting off the boat. She made an easy landing, flapping her wings just before impact to slow herself down, but thanks to her three hundred feet, she still made a resounding Thud! upon impact, and even shook the ground a little, which scared the crowd of tourists quite a bit. They yelped and cringed back out of instinct, though they mostly relaxed upon recognizing her. (She still got a few annoyed looks, though).

"Sorry about that, everyone!" Soyaka announced, waving at them. With a snap of her fingers, she shifted to her human form. "Just figured I'd welcome you all to our island! I am the main attraction, right?" She added, chuckling. "Now then, who all's here, anyway?" Carefully, Soyaka sat down before the crowd--which also shook the ground, and she couldn't help but laugh at that--to get a better look. There was the usual mish-mash of ages, races, men and women...but it looked like certain people in the crowd seemed especially eager to see her....

Footnotes
1  (1) This was a feature installed by her alien creators more or less on an idle whim; figuring that a city-smashing titan who liked kids was nicely ironic. Needles to say, their reaction upon learning that this backfired consisted mostly of words that were four letters long, and spoken at great volume.
1312.title: The Troop of Tourists

choices: Virtual Kaiju Battle, with the kids as superheroes, and Soyaka as a monster!
13122.content:
The crowd were all looking up at Soyaka with smiles and grins, but it was the children who seemed ready to burst from the excitement. They were hopping from one leg to another, waving in happy greeting, and some were even jumping in place to see over the adults; their heads popping up and down from the back of the tour group. It was actually pretty adorable.

Okay, it was really adorable. As in, Soyaka actually squeed. She loved kids, after all.

Soyaka clapped her hands together, grinning from ear to ear. "Well, looks like we've got a lot of fans of mine here. Come on out where I can see you all, kids; parents, stay near if you want--but don't worry, I'm safe."

The crowd shuffled a bit as the kids all elbowed their way around the adults and came to the forefront of the adults. They were quite the fun-looking bunch, really--a smattering of ages (at least one boy looked as old as thirteen) and looks, mostly dressed in swim trunks or other summer clothes, and they all wore big grins on their faces.

But there was one boy in particular that especially caught her eye. He looked about ten or eleven, and he was in a wheelchair with fat tires, easily rolling himself across the sand with only a slight show of effort. He was on the skinny side, but he looked healthy and vibrant; he even seemed to have gotten a recent tan. The kid even parked his wheelchair right in front of the other children, and cocked a grin up at the colossal girl in front of him.
He rose an arm, and gave a little half-wave.

Soyaka almost squeed again, but managed to catch herself. She leaned forward and focused on the wheelchair-bound youngster. "Hiya there, kiddo. What's your name?" She asked in a bright voice.

The kid held his smirk. "My name's Luke, Miss Soyaka..." His smirk widened. "And...nice swimwear."

A chorus of whoops and laughs came from the children at Luke's innuendo; a few boys came up to give high-fives.
The adults were less amused, with a few even looking up with fear at Soyaka.

The young giantess was used to this kind of thing, though. Her preference for wearing a bikini most of the time had rose a few eyebrows with tourists whenever children were present. Not that Soyaka minded much. "Thanks, Luke!" she quipped. Addressing the crowd as a whole she announced, "Now for all of you--I've got something really cool to tell ya: the guys who keep my island running have just finished upgrading the Virtual City, and--"

"Isn't that where you go when you wanna smash stuff without hurtin' anybody?" A red-haired girl interrupted.

Soyaka chuckled, ignoring the interruption. "Right-o, missy. Anyway, they changed it up so other people can be in the simulation with me...no more chasing around fake digital people. And even better...." she paused for dramatic effect, "...they added a few special games for the tinies with me. If you want to, and your parents are okay with it," she looked up at the adults and smiled; "you all can hop in for a spell and play! Maybe you could all be superheroes fighting the evil monster Soyaka-zilla!" She finished with big grin.

The kids went into a happy frenzy, all clamoring at once for their parents to let them play with "Miss Soyaka".
Needless to say, they conceded quite quickly.1

===30 Mintues Later, on another part of the Island===

Soyaka stood in the huge, empty room with her hands on her hips. She'd traded her bikini for a black body-suit (that was so tight that she felt a little embarrassed wearing it around the children) that let her interract with the Virtual City. The kids were similarly garbbed, all standing together in a bunch just before her and looking giddy. Luke had even gotten a special wheelchair that would change shape once the VR kicked in (he'd chosen a small UFO as his vehicle). After some assurances that this was all indeed safe, the adults had all gone off to the villa for lunch and some relaxation.

"Okay kids, we're about to start up the Virtual City!" Soyaka announced. "Now remember, you can't get hurt here, no matter what happens--but you can get a 'Game Over' and drop out of the sim. If that happens, you'll have to wait a bit before you jump back in. Got it?"

The kids all nodded.

"Great! Now, everyone get ready...." Soyaka announced, as a deep rumbled kicked in from what seemed like all the walls. "Because here...we...GO!" There was a flash of light, and Soyaka and the children found themselves in a cityscape, towering skyscrapers and busy streets everywhere.
And of course, Soyaka herself--rendered in the VR clad in her trademark blue bikini--towering above much of the city, with only a few skyscrapers coming close to her height.

She cracked an ear to ear grin, and rose her hands into the air. "Let the games begin, kids!"

But what was the game Soyaka and her playmates had chosen for their romp in the Virtual City?

Footnotes
1  When one has a crowd of giddy children pleading to do something fun, and a 300-foot alien standing nearby, parental strictness tends to go out the window.

14.content:
The meteor struck Russia in early 2013. Nothing special was thought of it, just some random space debris flying down into the atmosphere and exploding. But humanity never suspected its true purpose. During its flight through our atmosphere, the highly advanced and disguised probe gathered information of all kinds on our fragile green world. It sent back reports: Luscious green forests, breathable atmosphere, and precious water. Sadly, it was already inhabited by an annoyingly advanced race that called themselves "humans".

Soyaka was not disturbed by this. Her name was known by all space-faring civilizations, and became synonymous with 'world-eater'. Ships that encountered her traveling through deep space had a better chance of escaping a black hole after passing the event horizon. Further, when she consumed the hapless traveller Soyaka would follow their trail through the void. Once she landed on a planet it was all over. Its inhabitants would be ruthlessly exterminated, its resources sucked dry, and Soyaka would vanish back into the depths of space. What was one small species before her might?

But humanity was a particularly vicious and resourceful species. Other civilizations watched, fearing the day the humans would stop fighting each other and start fighting the rest of the galaxy. Could they succeed where so many others had failed? Or would they join countless other worlds in filling Soyaka's stomach?
14.title: Space rocks

choices: Sam looks for burgers on the mainlands
145.content:
Sam walked down the wide avenues of Atlantis, ecstatic to finally be able to see the city. Its fame was legendary, despite being in existence only since 2014. It was built on the waters of Lake Superior, miles from any shores. The settlement came after peace was made between the United States and Canada, and was rapidly turned into a major tourist attraction. It was enormous, at least fifty square miles. Everything a major urban area had to offer was contained on Atlantis. Sam had come for the week after finals, to relax and unwind after a particularly brutal set of tests. And spending days on the beach interspersed with good food had certainly done this for him. Today, he had journeyed to downtown. It was just like any other, huge skyscrapers, an assortment of commercial spaces, theaters, restaurants, and concert halls. Sam was entirely able to forget he was on a man-made island drifting over a lake.

He stepped into a promising burger place that advertised the best burger anywhere in the two superpowers. When the steaming creation was delivered next to a mountain of golden, oversalted fries he was inclined to believe them. The burger was heavy in his hands as he raised it to his mouth. He closed his mouth over the delicious bun and the succulent meat, the flavor erasing all other senses as his taste buds absorbed the best sandwich in creation. When the first bite slid serenely down his throat, a harsh shrieking sound filled his ears. The population of the restaurant surged to the windows, chattering and pointing excitedly. Sam was torn between the window and the burger. He quickly took another bite, savoring its every flavor and texture. Then he went to the windows to satisfy his curiosity. The crowds were already too dense to allow a good view of anything, but he saw a vague shape hurtling from the sky. It seemed little more than a spot of orange light streaking across the sky, right for Atlantis. Sam was not unduly concerned. The burger would grant him immortality. Speaking of which, he hadn't had a bite in a moment. He hurried back to the table to grab another chunk before returning to the impending doom. He wiped the excess grease off with a napkin and tried to return to the window. But the object was much bigger now and coming closer, pushing a wall of sound before it. While Sam was still steps away from the table it struck the street several hundred feet from the restaurant. The entire city shook, and the object kept hurtling up the street. As it passed the restaurant the entire front half was torn off, obliterated by whatever had landed. Sam was fine, just thrown to the floor instead of annhiliated by space debris. Calmly dusting the remnants of the building off of himself, Sam picked up his burger and walked onto the street. Taking a bite, he peered around a shattered wall. The next three shops had been similarly destroyed. Sam took another bite, calming his inner terror at his near death experience.

Sam stepped onto the street. The pavement was gouged by the landing. In some places, water seeped up through huge cracks in the surface. Looking up the street, he saw the landed thing. It appeared to be a pair of huge feet. Sam's heart jumped. Another bite of burger calmed everything. He casually walked towards the space feet. They radiated heat from entry into the atmosphere, steam rising off them in waves. As Sam stepped between them he saw they were connected to two huge legs. Which were in turn connected to a huge waist, covered in an electric blue bikini bottom. Which was most likely connected to the rest of a huge body. Sam stepped to the outside of the feet and walked on. When he came to the swimsuit bottom he could see the rest of the body. A rather cute girl, unclothed except for a blue bra matching her bikini bottom. Her face was framed by black hair, a contented smile on it. She appeared to be sleeping. Sam chewed on another bite of Zeus' burger and walked on. He reached the stomach, which rumbled loudly as he passed. Another bite of burger. He stepped over an arm and past the chest, which lay atop a flattened bus. More burger. Finally he reached the face. Sam was unsure of what to do from here. He stared up at the enormous girl for a while.

Then her eyes flickered open. She looked up at the skyscrapers and the blue sky. She sat up. She looked at the path of destruction her landing had created and laughed, a cute little giggle. Because of her size it nearly ruptured the eardrums of everyone present. She spoke in an alien tongue, but Sam could understand her because of the mighty burger's powers.

"After 10,000 years in space to see the greatest vacation planet in the galaxy, finally! I am feeling a tiny bit peckish, I heard the local fare is delicious!" she licked her lips. "Endangered species like humans are so much fun to play with. I hope you don't all break too soon. But now, something for my belly!" With that, the girl snatched up a few nearby people and dangled them over her perfectly spaced teeth. Her tongue stuck out to accept the gifts and they disappeared forever. She popped to her feet, curves bouncing, and bounded off down the street. Sam tried to take another bite of burger, but it was gone. Panicked, he began to scream hysterically while running in circles.

1551.content:
Soyaka stood amid the ruins of Philadelphia. The downtown area was little more than rubble thanks to her, and thousands of citizens would never again see anything. But the menace from beyond the stars was no more. Everywhere alien troopers lay dead and dying. The elite of the Emperor's army was vanquished in a day by this colossal beast of a woman. Even the most stalwart of soldiers, trained to exterminate an entire race without batting an eye, broke and ran, even SURRENDERED to the humans when they got the chance. The bravest had fought for a time before her feet had pounded them into submission. She knew the humans would begin to move in to reclaim the land soon. Mayhaps they would wonder about the high rate of civillian casualties. Her satisfied stomach argued it wouldn't matter, they would find nothing anyways. Soyaka normally didn't eat the people she defended but the aliens had tasted absolutely revolting. And well, when you're hungry...

At the moment she watched a mob of five or so humans brutally executing the wounded in a crashed transport. She was slightly sickened, and her thundering footsteps scattered them like roaches. She plucked one of the slower ones up, staring at him with unrestrained disgust.

"How would you like it if I did that to your race? Or better yet, if I squeezed just a little tighter," She said, doing just that. He didn't pop like some of her victims, but it did him no good. She gathered whoever was still breathing from below her and laid them out in her hand. With utter disregard for any below her, she strutted through the ruins. It only took about ten minutes to find a human military outpost. At her approach they readied their weapons.

'Not like they could stop me,' she thought. But she would crush them another day. With unusual gentleness, she lowered the injured aliens and human to ground level. Seeing what she intended, two corpsmen ran forward and onto her fingers. Despite the atrocious things she did to essentially everyone, Soyaka was known to try and be nicer to medics. This meant she never intentionally killed them. But when there were thousands of tiny people swarming beneath her feet, it gets a little hard to tell. Nevertheless, they managed to pull the dozen or so people off. Then she stood up to her full height.

"Treat him last," Soyaka pointed to the human and then left. At the edge of the Atlantic ocean, she jumped in and headed for home

Right now, we go to the same base where Volt, Viola, and Mist are trying to discuss their next plan. They were frustrated that they couldn't get Soyaka to join their cause at all, especially Mist. Still, in order for the kaiju girls to rule over humanity, they have to get Soyaka to join them or destroy her all together, however Mist has no desire to destroy her at all still. That's when Volt says something.

"Man, I am bored, let's go to the city and terrorize it again." Volt suggested just to get herself out of her boredom. She is a destroyer, and she wants to destroy stuff. Viola was bored to, but she really doesn't care at the moment.

"Yeah Mist, we should go back out there." Viola said, agreeing with Volt's idea. However Mist wasn't really too happy with this idea, and proceeds to snap at them.

"NO!!!! We must think morons. Don't you get it, Annie nearly killed us, plus Soyaka proves to be one too much. That is why we need to start thinking a way of defeating her, so we can get her to either join us or destroy her. It is cruical that we ensure our rule as goddesses, so we cannot go out there risking ourselves again." Mist shouted just as she suffocates Volt and Viola a bit before she stops. She then turns back to the mirror that was in there to look at herself. "So far, nothing has work!"

"Is that so?" said an unknown voice that is extremely loud so that the kaiju girls can hear them.

"Who's there?!" Volt said, starting to notice something is not right. The voice is loud, so it seems to be another kaiju girl. "SHOW YOURSELF!!!" Volt then roared just as she got into battle position.

"Yeah, show yourself!" Viola demanded as well.

"Oh, but you will be surely surprised. Don't you want to take a guess of who it is?"

"I am in no mood for games! Now I will ask you just like the others... SHOW YOURSELF!!!!!" Mist demanded. Then suddenly a dark lightning hits the ground and then it seemly forms into a shape of this girl. (http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--MF8FqFIoPI/Tc...) The kaiju girls were in shock to see that this new figure is a tiny human being. "I been watching you." the human girl said.

Volt, Viola, and Mist were all surprised to see the young girl around the age of 9-10 appear before them, but also they were ready to attack because not only she is a human, but also she found their lair. "You have no right coming here you foolish human!!!!! Now you will pay the price for it!!!!" Volt said just as she raise her monster foot to stomp her, and just as she tries to do it, a barrier forms around the girl, who was holding some sort of magical staff and Volt was blasted back against the wall.

"Well I have every right coming here. My name is Haruka (note I am using only her name and appearance from Daigunder), and I am now the ruler of the kaiju girls, and you will bow down to me and do my every bidding." Haruka said with an assuring stance just as she uses her staff to get both Volt and Viola to bow down to them, shocking Mist. Mist was now angry, and tries to use her power to suffocate Haruka, but Haruka was unfased at all. "Sorry foolish girl, but I am afraid that my powers that I have makes me invinicible to your air attacks. You will bow down before me or suffer the consquences."

"I bow to no one! I am made out of air, so your magic cannot phase me, plus there is only one true leader of the kaiju girls, and that is me! MIST!!!!!" Mist shouted in anger.

"Is that so, perhaps this could change your mind." Haruka said just as she fires her staff again and this it hits Mist, and then rain pellets start to come out of Mist. She turns into a cloud and rain comes out of her. "No... what have you done?!!!!!" Mist screamed in pain just as she turns into rain and liquid.

"Don't underestimate my immense power!" Haruka then said just as she fires her staff again and make some sort of a new cup that will contain her. "I am now the leader of the kaiju girls, and anyone who stands in my way will suffer the consquences. Now I understand that you have a enemy you want to either convert or destroy, and I will surely help you with that, however there is a price."

"What is it?!!!" Volt said.

"You must serve me as of now. I have big plans for this world, and we all want to rule it, but I also want to gain immortality, so I would rule this world as a goddess, but just lke Mist said. We need to plot things out. So Mist, I have a job for you. I want you to warn Soyaka, and any of her allies about me. I want her to know about me, and what I am capable of. Fail me and I will ensure that you never go back to your mist form again! Better yet I will just strip you of your power and kill you on the spot. After all, I got more worthy replacements coming here at this very moment." Haruka added just before she spills the liquid that the Mist is now into the sewers. Volt and Viola were all in fear of Haruka's immense power, but were impressed as well.

"Come you two, we must begin preparing our plan. We are going to break Soyaka's spirit, and then we can either convert her to darkness, or destroy her and everything that she ever cares about." Hakura said just as she uses her magic to make the base of the kaiju girls much better. Hell is now here!

15533222222222111111222121211121112.content:
As Mist drifts away, she remembers how it all started. She remember herself as a human. She used to be called Madeline Rockefeller. Much like how she looks now, but with human skin, black long hair, and fancy clothes.

She remembers her father always telling about being the superior one and always conquer everything. Her father never accepted weakness and would always scold her if she cried or was too slow to do something.

Most people think that since she's rich, she gets the good stuff. You thought wrong. Mist never had any of that. She had really plain dull food and a plain room compare to what her home looks like. She spend her time studying or be neglected by her father. Her father ironically also tortures himself the same way as he kept reading through notes and yell at himself in the mirror.

Her father would sometimes yell at her about how the current mayor is not worthy and complains about how everyone thinks he's crazy.

One day as she was watching her father make a speech in the park. A strange gas appear. Everybody ran away, but Madeline tripped and the gas got her. She looked at herself seeing that she is slowly turning into air and becoming transparent.

She felt lighter, but at the same time felt as if air pumped into her. She got to her father who was frighten of him. Madeline saw herself expanding and part of her gassy form got into her father's mouth, killing him. The girl was frighted and drifted off.

She kept growing and became more transparent. She spotted a group of people trying to leave, but the walls are in the way. Madeline things that this might be a chance to be a hero. She went up to the wall and tries to use her gas body to break down the wall. Instead of gratitude, they ran in fear.

Madeline notice that her appearance really does look scary. She looks like a blob melting into gas.

After the event, she kept going and going with no direction. Everywhere she went, people feared her. The police and military attacked her, but everything they do always go through her. At this point, Mist is just a giant piece of air that is a silhouette of her old self. At least she still got her face. She floated in hiding to the nearby woods.

As she tries to settle there, she spotted a giant girl with butterfly wings with a colorful aura. The girl was just sitting there looking like she is moping.

"Are you all right?", asked Madeline.

"Just kind of upset of what happened. At least I could somehow made this giant Viola. No need to worry about the size of my instrument.", said the girl as she presents Madeline a violin like instrument.

The gassy girl looked at her with confusion, "How come you don't look too upset?"

"I always get abandon by my family and friends. They think I'm weird. They started to really not like me after I became like this.", said the butterfly girl.

"Well, I know where you been through."

"Say, how about we be friends?"

Madeline/Mist was happy about the idea. She then spotted some campers.

"We need to find another place to hide in."

The two found a big hole suddenly. It looked like someone broke through it and the Kaiju girls went in.

As they ran they converse a bit.

"My name is Violet! How about you?"

"I'm Madeline. Its nice to have someone nice to me for a long time."

They tried to look for a place to hide in, hoping that there is still room for them to move, until they heard a thumping sound. It came from further in a damaged pathway and the girls followed it. They then spotted an alligator like girl just sitting there. She woke up looking at them.

"Who the heck are you two?"

"Um, we're monsters like you. Since you live here, could we live with you too?", asked Madeline.

"Give me one good reason why." asked the lizard girl.

Madeline/Mist started to remember what her father has taught her. After all that she being through from drifting to places seeing people hate her. Hearing the fact that her new friend was always abandon by people who are suppose to care for her. The girl decided this...

"We have something in common. We turned into monsters that no one likes. You are probably neglected too I suppose.", said Madeline.

"Ha. I got nothing to begin with. Though I do scare people a lot and I destroy things when I felt like it."

"Well, how would you like to join me to do so? Join me to finally get some respect. Humans are weak and they continue to show weakness when they see us. They need to be place where they belong, below us. We have the power and they don't. You can destroy them and anything as you like while I will help you and all that has suffer the same fate be the superior race!", cried Madeline with pride.

The misty girl did not care if her dad is proud of her in hell, but she did what she had to do. Violet was interested on what Madeline said.

"You got spunk. I'll let you lead your master plan, but remember this. This is my house and I demand some authority.", said the Lizard girl.

"Very well, we are all equal aren't we. We do live in a country that believes in freedom.", said Madeline.

"I get ya. Also, the name's Volt.", said the Lizard girl.

"My name is Madeline."

"And I'm Violet and we just met."

"First off, you girls need nicknames. It would be stupid if we attack and scream 'Ah its Madeline."

"Then I shall be called Mist.", said Madeline.

"How about Viola? Its represents my love for music and it reminds me of my name."

"Very well. Welcome home.", said Volt.

This is the story of Mist and how she met Viola and Volt. Ever since that day, she has become strict. Volt gain some more respect for her and Viola does the same and manage to make new clothes. The occasionally attack cities to steal for some useful goods and spread their terror.

It is time we bring them to our knees, and crush their spirits!!!!!! THEIR END IS NEAR!!!!!!!!!!!!" It was all out complete hell in the city. People were screaming, running, driving, etc just to get away from the kaiju girls' biggest attack. Not even the miliary is able to do anything about it at all, since their weapons are about as useful as their strength, which is weak at the moment. Both Lunar Knight and Soyaka come to face the kaiju girls to see a few shocking things.

"WHAT?!!! Annie, what are you doing here on their side again?" Cried Soyaka.

"Well guess who's back, and better than ever?!!!!!! Thanks to Haruka, Anni-Thing is back!" Anni-Thing back said evilly with a smile just as she crushes a building with her hands.

"I can't believe this. Why would you turn on me after all I did to help you?" Cried Soyaka again.

"It's not what I done, it's what you and the humans have done. Thanks to Haruka, I really know the truth now. You did betray me, and now I am going to make you pay!" Anni-Thing laughed evilly.

"And that is not the only problem you will have to worry about." said by some sort of robotic sound just as a giant robot girl comes along. "I am Anti-Soyaka, but more specifically.... your mother Soyaka."

Upon hearing that, Soyaka was absolutely shocked and is emotionally shattered to hear that. Soyaka then fell to the ground, noticing her mother now as a robot, but she looks like her. "Mom?..." Soyaka said in shock. "Is that really you? Why are you doing this?"

"To help us ensure our spot as goddesses among this planet. Haruka has shown me the truth. I knew as a mother, I needed to do the best for you, so now decided that you and everyone else who is a kaiju girl, along with Haruka should rule the planet as goddesses. Don't you see, they will betray you. Just look around you Soyaka. Those military men are running like cowards."

Soyaka cries just as she notices the military men running like cowards, retreating, etc. "Well.... uh..."

"It is true, just admit it!" said by a small flying girl in the air. She was riding her staff. "My name is Haruka, and I have came here to watch this battle."

"You are the girl that Mist warned us about?!!!!!" Lunar Knight gritted her teeth just as she prepares to fight.

"Exactly, but boy was she a naughty girl, I had to get her out of the way before she can cause me anymore problems, but since she was nice enough lately, I think I will bring her back now." Haruka smiled, and then she opens the jar, and releases Mist from her containment. "Now Mist, you be nice, or I will trap you in the jar completely!" Haruka smirked just as she uses her staff to control Mist. "But that is enough from me, I got big plans to start after I am through with you. After all, it is 2 against an army, and thankfully my army is ready to destroy you completely, or convert you into our cause. After this, I will go on to conquer humanity, or destroy them if they resist... but after all, this is the beginning of the end!"

"I will stop you Haruka.... no matter how much it takes. I will get my mother back, and my friend, and stop your plans completely." Soyaka said, now enraged just as she roars like a truly vicious monster. "That is what I want to see. Now my minions, break her down!" Haruka ordered.

What happens now?

Soyaka ran to her dad and shrunk to hug him. The father strokes her hair and said, "There is someone here who wants to meet you. He has a way for you to come back to life."

http://cdn3.volusion.com/sfdkq.qaryx/v/v...

"I am Kamen Rider Gaim. I am the entity that resides in the realm and is here to give you a second chance.", said the man.

Soyaka was given a lock.

"Use this new power to protect humanity. Just simply unlock it. You will gain power beyond measure.", said Gaim.

"I miss you to honey. Now go be a hero and make me proud.", said Soyaka's father.

Soyaka then left in a beam of light.

"Say, Gaim. Do you have somethin for my daughter?", asked Soyaka's father.

"What, no, I have a girlfriend already.", said Gaim.

"I stand corrected.", said Soyaka's dad who then sigh in relief.

1553322222222222211111.title: She Goes To Work and Thinks About Her Past!

15533222222222222111111.content:
“A movie shoot?” She coos with admiration; she is always wanted something like this to happen, and now it seems as if she is getting her chance.

Nodding, her manager adjusts his time while smiling. “Yes! In it you will be facing Chibi Chihiro.“

Overjoyed, Soyaka jumps up and down a little bit in her chair; she gets to see her friend and have the two of them get famous all the same time! She makes her way onto the set, where the younger version of Chihiro is waiting while wearing an orange bikini. The two embrace. “Hi, Chihiro! It’s so great seeing you again!”

Lightly nodding, Cheadle responds with as much charisma as her friend. “That’s true! It’s been a while!”
15533222222222222111111.title: A Film Set and A Friend!

155332222222222221111111.content:
“Action!” Her manager yells from a megaphone after a few minutes of letting them catch up with each other. As the call is heard, the to instantly change your demeanor. They both go into respective areas that are designated by cardboard cutouts where they should stand and proceed to roar and flail about, knocking down mock buildings in shooting fire in lasers as well. The to approach each other with ferocity, but then realized to each other are and decide to team up and destroy the buildings together. Afterwards, they embrace while in their characters, and then the role to end Is heard. “Great work, girls!” The manager proclaims; this is going to be his greatest film yet.

Turning towards him, the two look at him sincerely and say without thinking, “thank you so much mister!”

info.brief_description: We have a giant monster, but it's looks human, and is very cute. Please add.
info.description:
Thinking back on Korina was kinda bad for me as I kinda gotten myself into a rut with the stories, and seeing that my story wasn't all that a hit, I decided to get rid of Korina, so now in it's place is Soyaka: The Cute Kaiju Giantess.

Kaiju is the term for giant monsters, and for this case, a 200ft-300ft tall giantess with superpowers. However, she is incredibility cute, and this story is all about here that's for sure. She is actually an alien known as the Gonina, and she has came to Earth for one reason only, to conquer us with her incredible beautiful looks and abilites, however... you be hard pressed to find a scary monster unless you choose a different route, because she is all about looks, cuteness, etc... and everything else... that will come to you.

Here is Soyaka's looks.

http://giantessbooru.com/post/view/137599?search=Giantess%20swimsuit%20destructi...

Soyaka: She is a 13-14 year old alien that looks completely like a human, and even is a human if you have to explain that somehow. Her long plurish blue hair with a green bowtie on it, pale skin, sharp body, green eyes, and C-Cup (maybe D or F) breasts sure make her attractive and a joy to behold. She is around 200ft-300ft tall (you can decide the specifics) and she has the abilites of being able to breath fire, shoot hyper beams from her mouth or hands, shoot out lasers from her eyes, can do sealth, and lastly... she has a very unique power that seperates her from the crowd on my other stories. She wears a light blue two piece bikini suit.

She can actually mutate into different forms and go back to human at her very own will. She has alot of forms, but I am going to go over 3 of them right now. She can also do mixed forms, where it gives her some of the monsters features, but other than that, she is mostly human in look.

Godzilla Soyaka: The Godzilla form of Soyaka... she takes a very similar look to the Giant Lizard (head is not mutated at all and is pale) and her powers are increased, but she has less control and is more easily going to destroy. She gains a new tail, mutates, etc.

Mixed Dragon Soyaka: Soyaka gains a mixed form where dragon wings and a dragon tail appear on her, and she uses this for flight.

Robot Soyaka: This is the third of her forms, in this one... Soyaka turns into a robot (technology) and she can let others use her, etc... you get the point.

How you use her... is up to you.

Rules:

1. No Nudity, she will be clothed somehow regardless, and no heavy sexual stuff.
2. Vore is fine (if she is evil)
3. Chapters must be at least a paragraph or 2 long.
4. No Male Giants
5. They can be more than one Giantess in the story
6. No Scat or Tiolet Crap
7. No Gay or Lesiban stuff
8. Do have fun

Since you got that down, here we go!

Also: Make sure to check out my friend Redhurricane's interactives Monster Arms and Monster Shores

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1927548-Monster-Shores

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1897471-Monster-Arms
